data.name: title
data.value: Add sites

data.name: descr
data.value:
This page allows you to propose a new site to be added to the search catalog. The site will only be used once an administrator has validated the addition.
Veuillez à bien saisir le bon chemin dans le dernier champ. Otherwise the search will not be successful and no results will be found.

data.name: url_site
data.value: Root URL / Search URL

data.name: url_tooltip
data.value: Basic URl of the site and the one allowing to make searches

data.name: icon_url
data.value: Full URL of the icon

data.name: icon_url_tooltip
data.value: URL pointing to the site image (icon or favicon in the worst case)

data.name: icon_tooltip
data.value: render the image with the same dimensions as the one in the search table

data.name: name_tooltip
data.value: name of the site displayed in the search table

data.name: name
data.value: Site name

data.name: type_tooltip
data.value: Allows to know which sites to enter according to the search

data.name: type
data.value: Type of site

data.name: id_result_tooltip
data.value: ID of the tag from where the path will start. the path starts from the tag body if the id is empty

data.name: id_result
data.value: Starting beacon id

data.name: a_path_tooltip
data.value: Path from the body tag. Must end with a

data.name: a_path
data.value: HTML tag path to a search result

data.name: btn_a_path_tooltip
data.value: allows to retrieve the element directly on the web page (experimental)

data.name: nb_res_path
data.value: Path from the HTML tag to the text containing the number of results.

data.name: optional
data.value: Optional

data.name: post_tooltip
data.value: values to send in the background

data.name: multi_tooltip
data.value: If the site is foreign, 3 searches specifying the languages will be performed. (vostfr, vf, multi)

data.name: modal_site_title
data.value: HTML from the site address

data.name: modal_site_descr
data.value:
Click on a search result, preferably the first one. If there are no results you can start another search.
The current search is :

data.name: modal_btn_change
data.value: change search

data.name: close
data.value: Close

data.name: modal_site_descr_2
data.value:
Click on the text indicating the number of results. If there are no results you can start another search.
The current search is :

data.name: modal_post_title
data.value: Hidden values to send

data.name: modal_post_descr
data.value:
List of values that will be sent to the site. A single '?' will be replaced by the search (ex: one piece).
If one of the two columns is empty, the line will be ignored.

data.name: nom
data.value: Name

data.name: Value
data.value: Value

data.name: help
data.value:
when adding a search URL, a search button to "simplify" the retrieval of the tag to locate a search result.

the content of the dialog is that of the web page found at the address entered. This page does not contain Javascript and the CSS files have been removed (by the server).
